Articles.Content:
Hey! Hope this is the right forum.

I'd like to display my crafts in Sketchfab, but the only exporter for KSP is Windows-only. Does anyone know how to convert that application to OSX, or can make a Mac version themselves? Thanks a ton!

[The exporter in question.](https://sketchfab.com/exporters/kerbalspaceprogram)

I don't have a fix myself, but it's possible to open .exe files using [WineBottler](http://winebottler.kronenberg.org), a program that can open Windows programs in Macs. I haven't tried it myself with Sketchfab itself, but it should work. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
I'm actually wondering this as well, do we know what files are the ship sketches on the mac version?
